Title: [1.14] Streaming interface (design + stub)
Body: Goal: Define chat_stream return type and add default impl in trait (already wraps chat). Add TODO adapter methods; add NullProvider test using single-chunk vector. Acceptance: trait compiles; tests green.

Title: [1.17] Provider docs
Body: Goal: Add docs/providers.md covering traits, capabilities, factory, routing, and adapter notes. Acceptance: file exists and linked from README.
